Author: GordmanMD
Title: [Ann]PEP Network ICO- The first decentralized and personalized content ecosystem
Body: ‚ÄºÔ∏èWe are happy and proud to announce a new weekly contest with large cash prizes paid out in PEP Tokens.  ‚úîÔ∏è Weekly Pep Network Avatar Contest: Hey everyone! We are excited to announce a new contest where you can win large cash prizes that will be paid out in Pep Tokens EVERY WEEK. Simply follow the rules below to participate. Good luck!  ‚úîÔ∏è Pep Network avatar contest rule guide:  Download the proprietary Xpresso application from the Android or IOS store: ‚û°Ô∏èhttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mobigraph.xpresso&hl=en  ‚û°Ô∏èhttps://itunes.apple.com/us/app/xpresso-3d-avatar-gif-sticker/id1166463415?mt=8 Create an account with Xpresso Use the application to create an avatar animations showcasing the contest currency of the week (could be btc, eth, xmr, etc) Post your new avatar animation to all applicable social networks (see point system below) Record proof of every network you submitted your avatar to via our online spreadsheet so that we can track it here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSenVg6OFbH6d8WhZFVfMUHHhuRiwIoCRuPask0RrVbLVEjqRg/viewform Maximum of 3 submissions per contestant. (We will perform KYC before money is paid out, so don‚Äôt waste time trying to cheat) Whichever post is Liked, Shared, Retweeted, and Reposted the maximum no. of times Wins (We will decide winner on the basis of maximum points at the end of the week)   Point system: ‚ûñ5 points for making the avatar animation ‚ûñ1 point for submitting to twitter ‚ûñ1 point for submitting to reddit ‚ûñ1 point for submitting to telegram ‚ûñ1 point for submitting to facebook ‚ûñ1 point each time someone Likes, Shares, Retweets, and Reposts your post on Social mediums   Weekly prize: ‚ûñ1 place - $500 in PEP tokens ‚ûñ2 place - $200 in PEP tokens ‚ûñ3 place - $100 in PEP  This is a chance for you and other PEP Network community members to get free tokens while having fun. The contest rules, and its point system, are outlined below  https:/[Suspicious link removed]/51rhCJrPlD

Author: peterkate630
Title: [Ann]PEP Network ICO- The first decentralized and personalized content ecosystem
Body: PEP Network is introducing first blockchain render protocol for personalizable content marketplace. They have noticed a new type of content related to improved type of emojis and stickers, which allows to express emotions through apps by personalized reaction animations and means of communications similar to real face-to-face conversation. PEP Tokens will be used as the primary payment option within the platform and marketplace. They can be spent on personalizable content or earned by content creators. Moreover, there will be an interesting mining feature for the platform, as any user can devote their idle CPUs and GPUs and internet connection and participate in the ecosystem to render consumer personalized content at runtime. No matter how simple or ordinary the idea of animated and personalized emojis may seem, when technological giants like Samsung and Apple are also working on such technologies, it can only mean that it is going to be huge. The platform seems to be prepared very well, the designs and content of the whitepapers and documentations are on a very good level.

Author: cryptohype
Title: [Ann]PEP Network ICO- The first decentralized and personalized content ecosystem
Body: PEP Network intends to bring all the content players (Messaging apps, Sticker platforms, Content creators, Ad Tech Units, Brands, App developers, Keyboard platforms, etc.), both existing and upcoming under one umbrella that corroborates personalization and self-expression commerce prioritizing consumer experience.

Author: smauni
Title: [Ann]PEP Network ICO- The first decentralized and personalized content ecosystem
Body: Terms of PEP Network ICO  Pre-Sale. 15-17 May  1.   Personal Cap - $5K 2.   Bonus from 10% to 20%. For 1 to 5 referred - 10%, For 6 to 10 referred - 15%, For 11 and more - 20% 3.   Only 2 000 Whitelisted Participants 4.   Whitelist will be closed on May 10th  How to participate  1.   Register in Whitelist 2.   Get referral link 3.   To get into the Pre-Sale publish a post about the project in social networks + bring at least one friend by referral link + create GIF in the app Xpresso and publish it in the chat. 4.   Invite friends and increase Personal Cap, Bonus, and your chance to participate in Pre-Sale 5.   For every referred you can increase Personal Cap for $1K. For example, if you will refer 5 users then you can buy PEP from $5K to $10K 6.   For every 5 referred you can increase your bonus for additional 5% but not more than 20% in total. For example, if you will refer 7 users then you will get additional 15% PEP tokens for your purchase. 7.   You will be informed by email whether you get in Pre-Sale between 10th and 15th of May 8.   You have to pass KYC before token distribution. 9.   For complete your purchase you will have 48 hours. No hassle. All instructions will be announce after 10th May in Telegram chat, Medium, and by email.  Sale. 30 May - 30 June  1.   No bonuses 2.   Only Whitelisted participants 3.   Minimum and maximum Personal Cap will be announced after Pre-Sale 4.   You have to pass KYC before token distribution.   Airdrop for ICO participants. After ICO completed. Hard Cap must be reached.  1.   After ICO will be completed (only if Hard Cap will be reached) we will do an airdrop to all those who have not participated in Pre-Sale or Sale but passed Whitelist and KYC, and brought at least one referral, $50 in tokens to each. 2.   Limit for airdrop is 5 000 participants. 3.   The more referred you will bring the more chance to get into 5 000 participants. 4.   The more referred you will bring the more chances to reach Hard Cap by PEP Network and thus more chances to get free PEP

Author: GordmanMD
Title: [Ann]PEP Network ICO- The first decentralized and personalized content ecosystem
Body: That's correct!  Our first product QUGO was launched in 2015, it was a messenger with our avatar technology. With QUGO, we realized that it‚Äôs hard for users to adapt one more messenger. At the same time, QUGO users wanted to share their animated avatars to friends in other chat platforms. We realised that users should be able to experience the animations on any platform of their choice and not be tied to one central platform. This was our first step towards decentralization.  We then created XPRESSO, our expression app, where user could create his avatar, personalize his animations with themes & text (in any language). These user personalized animations could then be shared over any digital communication. Xpresso currently has more that 580K+ users, with more than 12 Million customized GIFS shared monthly. To push the limits of personalization we are working on a new beta technology using AI , Compute Vision which will turn a user into a 3D Avatar with just a selfie.  To decentralize further, we wrapped the XPRESSO API‚Äôs into easy to use WEB API, android & iOS SDKs. The idea behind this strategy was to allow any developer big/small to use XPRESSO API  to add the personalizable expression on his existing or new apps. This has in turn helped us in identifying new use cases for this technology.

Author: GordmanMD
Title: [Ann]PEP Network ICO- The first decentralized and personalized content ecosystem
